message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value, even beyond this price point, but I'm open to discussing a mutually beneficial arrangement.
I'm really interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. Is there any room for negotiation?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 reflects the product's true value, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate the compromise, but $9,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $7,500. Is there any flexibility on your end?
